channel.title: Potential Court Wizard/Sage Rework (According to some of the community)
channel.description:
Court Wizard - Blue Dragon Support
Day Ability: True swap - Bait and switch and Warp bypass Occupy immunity tonight(3 uses)
Night ability 1: Bait and Switch - Swap the visitors of 2 targets. You can't swap yourself. (Unlimited)
Night ability 2: Warp - Give yourself Occupy immunity and swap all visitors between yourself and your target. (2 uses)
Sage - Unseen Support
Day Ability 1: True Swap - Same as before (3 uses)
Day Ability 2: Strong illusion - Visitors are not informed they're target was changed (2 uses)
Night ability 1: Teleport - Swap all visitors between 2 targets. Targeting yourself makes you Occupy immune for that night as well (Unlimited)
Night ability 2: Fire Wall - Same as now (2 uses)
Me fleshing out someone's idea of making the CW like the Transporter
